column1: Traffic reports will resume Thursday May 18 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: I-75S between Exit 95 and Exit 90 in Madison Co:
column4: The roadway is shut down due to a serious collision.

column3: I-75S between Exit 95 and Exit 90 in Madison Co:
column4: Detour at Exit 95 to US-25S to Exit 90, and back to I-75S.

column3: I-75S between Exit 95 and Exit 90 in Madison Co:
column4: Significant delays on US-25S and on I-75S starting in Fayette Co prior to the Clays Ferry Bridge.
